site.name: Astrology.com: The Leading Free Horoscope and Tarot Platform
site.tagline: Comprehensive astrology hub offering free daily horoscopes, tarot readings, birth charts, and compatibility tools for all zodiac enthusiasts
site.overview:
Astrology.com stands as one of the internet's most established astrology destinations, offering an extensive collection of free horoscopes, tarot readings, and astrological tools. The platform provides daily, weekly, and yearly horoscopes for all twelve zodiac signs, complemented by specialized readings for love, career, and dating.

Beyond horoscopes, the site features a robust free birth chart calculator, comprehensive tarot card interpretations covering all 78 cards plus over 6,000 two-card combinations, and detailed educational content spanning Western astrology, Chinese zodiac, and numerology. The platform also connects users with live psychic advisors through its partnership with Keen.com.

Operated by Horoscope.com, Inc. from San Francisco, the site balances substantial free content with premium reports ranging from $9.95 to $31.99. Its award-winning design and eight-year content archive make it an authoritative resource for beginners seeking accessible guidance and enthusiasts wanting deeper astrological insights.

Premium reports at $9.95-$31.99 are competitively priced for professional astrologer-written content. The subscription option for yearly horoscopes at $25.95/year provides savings for committed users. The free tier alone satisfies most casual astrology enthusiasts.

history.headquarters: 182 Howard Street #826, San Francisco, California 94105 USA
history.story:
Astrology.com operates under Horoscope.com, Inc., a San Francisco-based company that has established itself as a leading astrology media brand. The company positions itself as representing professional astrologers of all practices and backgrounds, with authenticity described as core to their ethos.

The platform has built an extensive content library spanning over eight years of daily articles, comprehensive educational resources, and interactive tools. Their partnership with Keen.com for live psychic readings expands their service offering beyond written content.

The site received industry recognition with a Digiday award for Best Overall Design, acknowledging their achievement in creating an accessible, visually appealing platform for astrological content. They continue to serve beginners, learners, and professionals alike with both free and premium astrological services.

primaryUsers: Tarot readers wanting card meanings and interpretations
Beginners learning about birth charts and zodiac signs
targetAudience.idealFor:
Daily Horoscope Readers: Users who want quick, free daily guidance across love, work, and general life areas will find comprehensive horoscopes for all signs updated daily

Tarot Learning Enthusiasts: The extensive free tarot library with 78 card meanings plus 6,000+ combinations serves as an excellent learning resource for beginners and intermediate readers

Astrology Beginners: Educational content explains zodiac signs, elements, modalities, houses, and planets in accessible language with visual aids and structured learning paths

Couples Exploring Compatibility: Free compatibility tools for all 144 zodiac combinations plus premium in-depth reports help couples understand their romantic dynamics

Multi-System Explorers: Users curious about multiple divination systems can explore Western astrology, Chinese zodiac, tarot, and numerology on a single platform
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Professional Astrologers: Advanced practitioners may find the content too basic and would benefit more from specialized professional tools and detailed ephemeris data

Non-English Speakers: With English as the only language option, users preferring content in other languages will need alternative platforms

Users Seeking Live Video Consultations: While psychic readings are available through Keen, users wanting face-to-face video sessions with astrologers would need dedicated consultation platforms

navigation.notes: Clean primary navigation with Horoscopes, Learn, Compatibility, Tarot, and Shop categories. Footer provides comprehensive secondary links. Dropdown menus reveal subcategories logically organized by content type.

design.notes: Award-winning design recognized by Digiday for Best Overall Design. Features dark/light mode toggle, clean typography, consistent visual hierarchy, and zodiac sign iconography throughout. Schema.org markup demonstrates technical SEO attention.

mobileExperience.notes: Fully responsive design adapts well to mobile screens. All tools and readings accessible on mobile. However, no dedicated mobile app means no push notifications for daily horoscopes.

accessibility.notes: Semantic HTML5 structure, proper heading hierarchy, keyboard navigation support, and dark mode option for visual comfort. Schema markup indicates attention to structured data and accessibility.

pageSpeed.notes: Content-heavy pages with multiple interactive elements. Some pages require JavaScript rendering for full functionality. Sitemap structure suggests large content volume which may impact some page loads.

depth.notes: Exceptional depth across topics with 78 individual tarot card pages, 6,000+ combination interpretations, 12 detailed zodiac profiles, and eight years of daily articles. Educational content covers fundamentals through advanced concepts.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Strong interactive elements including birth chart calculator, tarot card draws, compatibility checkers, and seven astrology games. Zodiac sign imagery and tarot card visuals enhance content. Limited video content observed.

contactability.notes: Support available via support@astrology.com and phone at 415-615-9028. Physical address disclosed at 182 Howard Street #826, San Francisco, CA 94105. Help center had access issues during testing.

legitimacy.notes: Legal entity clearly disclosed in Terms of Service as 'Horoscope.com, Inc., doing business as Astrology.com'. No individual team member profiles visible, but professional astrologer authorship claimed.

legal.notes: Both privacy policy (updated August 2023) and terms of service present and accessible. Includes Do Not Sell My Info page for CCPA compliance. Copyright claims contact available.

trustCredibility.summary: Astrology.com demonstrates strong credibility through transparent company disclosure, verifiable San Francisco headquarters, complete legal documentation, and industry recognition from Digiday. The established content archive spanning eight years and professional astrologer-authored content support legitimacy. Minor deductions for hidden team profiles and help center access issues.

faq.question: What is Astrology.com and what does it offer?
faq.answer: Astrology.com is a comprehensive astrology platform offering free daily horoscopes for all 12 zodiac signs, interactive tarot readings, birth chart calculations, compatibility tools, and extensive educational content. The site covers Western astrology, Chinese zodiac, tarot, and numerology, serving as a one-stop resource for astrology enthusiasts of all experience levels.

faq.question: Is Astrology.com free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, Astrology.com offers extensive free content including daily horoscopes, tarot readings, birth chart calculations, compatibility tools, and educational resources. Premium reports written by professional astrologers are available for purchase ranging from $9.95 to $31.99, but the free tier provides substantial value for most users.

faq.question: How accurate are Astrology.com horoscopes?
faq.answer: Astrology.com horoscopes and reports are written by professional astrologers using authentic techniques rather than auto-generated content. The platform emphasizes authenticity as core to their ethos and represents astrologers from various practices and backgrounds, ensuring interpretations follow established astrological principles.

faq.question: Can I get a free birth chart on Astrology.com?
faq.answer: Yes, Astrology.com provides a free birth chart calculator that generates your natal chart based on your birth date, time, and location. The free version shows planetary positions and basic interpretations. Premium birth chart reports offering deeper personalized analysis are available for $27.99.

faq.question: What tarot readings are available on Astrology.com?
faq.answer: Astrology.com offers multiple free tarot reading formats including Daily Tarot, Yes/No Tarot, Past-Present-Future spreads, Love Tarot, Career Tarot, Breakup Tarot, and more. The site also provides comprehensive meanings for all 78 tarot cards plus over 6,000 two-card combination interpretations.

faq.question: Does Astrology.com have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Currently, Astrology.com does not have a dedicated mobile app for iOS or Android. However, the website features a fully responsive design that works well on mobile browsers, allowing access to all horoscopes, readings, and tools from smartphones and tablets.

faq.question: Is Astrology.com legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Astrology.com is operated by Horoscope.com, Inc., a legitimate San Francisco-based company with disclosed headquarters at 182 Howard Street. The site has received industry recognition from Digiday for Best Overall Design and maintains transparent privacy policies and terms of service with CCPA compliance.

faq.question: How do I check zodiac compatibility on Astrology.com?
faq.answer: Visit the Compatibility section on Astrology.com where you can select two zodiac signs to see their love or work compatibility. The tool covers all 144 possible zodiac sign combinations for Western astrology and also offers Chinese zodiac compatibility checking. Premium detailed compatibility reports are available for purchase.

faq.question: What is Astrology+ on Astrology.com?
faq.answer: Astrology+ is a premium subscription service offered by Astrology.com that provides additional features including real-time transit notifications, enhanced birth chart analysis, live Q&A sessions, and personalized moon reports beyond the standard free content.

faq.question: Who owns Astrology.com?
faq.answer: Astrology.com is owned and operated by Horoscope.com, Inc., doing business as Astrology.com. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California at 182 Howard Street #826. They position themselves as a leading astrology media brand serving beginners, learners, and professionals.

summary.recommendation:
Astrology.com earns its position as a leading astrology platform through the sheer breadth and quality of its free content. The combination of daily horoscopes for all signs, an exceptional tarot reference library, free birth chart calculations, and comprehensive educational resources provides tremendous value without cost. The award-winning design makes navigation intuitive even across thousands of pages.

This platform is ideal for astrology enthusiasts who want reliable daily horoscopes, beginners learning about zodiac signs and tarot cards, and couples curious about compatibility. The eight-year content archive and professional astrologer authorship ensure quality interpretations. Users exploring multiple divination systems will appreciate the integrated coverage of Western astrology, Chinese zodiac, tarot, and numerology.

Users seeking advanced professional tools, non-English content, or dedicated mobile apps should look elsewhere. Professional astrologers may find the interpretations too generalized for their client work, and the English-only limitation excludes non-English speakers. The help center access issues observed during testing suggest potential customer support limitations.

With an overall score of 8.2/10, Astrology.com represents an excellent free resource that rivals many paid competitors. The freemium model strikes an effective balance, offering substantial value at no cost while providing deeper premium reports for those wanting personalized professional analysis. For anyone interested in astrology, horoscopes, or tarot, this site deserves a prominent bookmark.
